name: Speedpunk
description:
Welcome to the future! In the world where cars are flying.
Speedpunk is free-to-play futuristic racing game. Pick your flying car, fasten your seat belts and beat other players!

Speedpunk is new cyberpunk arcade racing game. Choose your car from a large selection of cars. Choose map and level and jump to a action. Race at big speed, but don't crash! Score as many stars as you can. Compete against drivers from around the world and take a global lead in the standings. Beat your friends and prove you are better driver.

Race


Beat other players


Choose your car


How fast can you drive?

Features:
• Free to play
• Lot of maps and levels
• Gorgerous graphics
• Lot of cars
• Low system requirements
• Lot of achievements
• Scoreboard - beat other players
